objects.text:
• 7-Quart Capacity
• Digital Timer (up to 20 hours)
• Travel-Proof Locking Lid
• Dishwasher Safe Components

product_details.description: Whether you’re feeding friends and family at home, or taking your meal on the go or to an event, the Crockpot 7 QT Cook & Carry Programmable Slow Cooker makes sharing a home-cooked meal with loved ones easy and effortless. The Cook & Carry travel-proof locking lid provides a tight seal to prevent leaks and spills, for no mess on the go, and convenient handles make it easy to carry and take your favorite slow cooked meals anywhere. A digital countdown control allows you to easily program your slow cooker from 30 minutes up to 20 hours. When cooking is completed, temperature automatically shifts to warm mode to avoid overcooking. The digital display also lets you track your meal progress and monitor remaining cook time. With a 7-quart capacity, it cooks meals for 9+ people, perfect for feeding a crowd. When you’re finished slow cooking, both the lid and the stoneware can be placed in the dishwasher for easy cleanup.

banner_details:
This banner design promotes a kitchen appliance, incorporating a modern and bold visual style accented by geometric overlays and layered colors. The background features a diagonal composition that splits from dark grey on the left to deep maroon on the right, intersected by subtle gradient lines and translucent circular patterns, creating visual depth. At the center-right, the product image is the focal point, balancing the bold header text ("heading") and subheading ("subheading") placed on the top-left. A decorative red line separates textual content from the detailed feature list ("description"). Pricing information ("price") stands out in large white bold font, while a call-to-action ("cta") is situated below in a vibrant red button ("cta_background"). The design effectively combines structured information with a clean and impactful aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Grey (#333333)
- Deep Maroon (#6D3535)
- Light Coral Pink (#E8A9A9)
- Bright Red (#C13434)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a Crockpot with a sleek, modern design centered around a minimalist and professional color palette. Dominated by a matte charcoal gray body (#6D6E71), the Crockpot projects a sophisticated, neutral aesthetic. The lid is topped with a muted silver-gray rim (#D4D4D4), complementing the darker tone. The control panel adds contrast with a light beige background (#F2F2F2) and soft gray buttons (#B1B3B5), giving a clean, approachable interface. The blend of dark and light shades ensures functionality is highlighted while preserving an overall cohesive blend. For a banner, consider pairing #6D6E71, #D4D4D4, #F2F2F2, and crisp white (#FFFFFF) with subtle accents.
